function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Financial vulnerability of small businesses","Impact":"Potential closure of businesses, loss of jobs, and economic instability","Mitigation":"Provide financial support, grants, and investment instruments","Technologies":"Financial technology, government aid programs","People":"Small business owners, employees, entrepreneurs","Owner":"Government, financial institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of systematic initiatives and government interventions","Impact":"Increased vulnerability of small businesses, lack of economic recovery, and loss of market share","Mitigation":"Implement systematic initiatives, financial programs, and economic policies","Technologies":"Data analytics, economic forecasting tools","People":"Government, policymakers, entrepreneurs","Owner":"Government, economic organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of support for small business resilience","Impact":"Inability to sustain and adapt to changing market conditions, limited innovation, and economic downturn","Mitigation":"Provide grants, tax waivers, and economic relief programs","Technologies":"Fintech solutions, economic forecasting tools","People":"Small business owners, entrepreneurs, employees","Owner":"Government, financial institutions"}]}
